patterns: what is ownership history of the location
responses: Encumbrance certificate certifies that there are no dues on the property, and the ownership of the property is clear and marketable. Encumbrance certificate contains details of all transactions done on the specific property. In Telangana, the Department of Registration issues encumbrance certificate.
